pr_title: Avoid crashes that might occur while initializing map providers

timeline.message: Catch possible exceptions while initializing map providers

timeline.bodyText: I'm just wondering if it's possible to put the MapView in a Fragment so we can have all the lifecycle "forwarding" in there. Thinking we have like a MapBoxInitializationFragment that the MainMenuActivity can host. Then we can keep all this noise out of MainMenuActivity.
timeline.author: seadowg

replies.bodyText: I think it's a good idea and I did it please take a look.
